+ measure(): bool " style="text;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;rotatable=0;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;fontStyle=0" vertex="1" parent="2"> <mxGeometry y="390" width="330" height="36" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18" value="+ setFilter(FilterType): void" style="text;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;rotatable=0;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;" vertex="1" parent="2"> <mxGeometry y="426" width="330" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="19" value="// Set MQTT client, topic, etc.
+ setMqtt(AsyncMqttClient *pClient, const char* topic,
 int qos=0, bool retain=false): void" style="text;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;rotatable=0;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;" vertex="1" parent="2"> <mxGeometry y="446" width="330" height="56" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="20" value="+ sendMeasure(): void // Publish MQTT message" style="text;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;rotatable=0;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;" vertex="1" parent="2"> <mxGeometry y="502" width="330" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="21" value="+ _read()=0: bool // Do sensor measurement" style="text;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;rotatable=0;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;" vertex="1" parent="2"> <mxGeometry y="522" width="330" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="22" value="// Abstract function to construct MQTT message payload
// string based on sensor values

g.text: // Call virtual function _read() to do measurement
// Abstract function to construct MQTT message payload

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 278px; margin-left: 372px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
